articles.description: Dick Strawbridge's eldest son James Strawbridge has shared how his father and stepmother, Angel Adoree, continue to make Escape to the Chateau such a big draw for Channel 4 viewers.

articles.title: TV tonight: hit sitcom Ghosts gets a glossy US adaptation - The Guardian
articles.description: The adaptation lacks the charms of its original cast. Plus, the BBC Young Jazz Musician 2022 is revealed. Here’s everything to watch this evening
articles.content:
Ghosts US
8.30pm, BBC Three
US adaptations of UK comedies are hit or miss and the jury is still out on this latest one. The format remains the same: Samantha and Jay inherit a dead aunts house teem… [+3996 chars]

articles.author: Stephen Armstrong
articles.title: Gary Oldman breaks his silence: 'I'd be happy to go out after Slow Horses' - The Times
articles.description: The actor talks divorce, booze and why he’ll happily retire after Mick Herron’s drama Slow Horses. By Stephen Armstrong
articles.content: Ive had an enviable career, but careers wane, and I do have other things that interest me outside of acting, says Gary Oldman, 64, thoughtfully. When youre young you think youre going to get round to… [+517 chars]

articles.title: ITV Coronation Street star 'can't cope' after Millie Gibson's huge career update - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: The actress has confirmed her next move after she quit the soap
articles.content:
Coronation Street stars flooded Millie Gibson with messages of support after she confirmed her next career role.
